title: Ticket #3796: Review Debian 7 full port.
description:
Review the standard universe changes made for Debian 7. This involves two sub-tasks:

  • Verify that all the new GLIBC213 #defines make sense.
  • Use (understand and update) the analyze_syscalls script (or something similar); add doing so to the full port instructions. Document which functions which ignored and why, if possible. Add analyze_syscalls to the other full port pages on the wiki so it won't be forgotten again.
remarks:
2014-Feb-06 17:42:18 by tlmiller:
Review of #defines completed as part of the RHEL 7 port.

Still need to do the analyze_syscalls work.

2018-Mar-01 14:32:09 by tlmiller:
Standard universe has been in maintenance-only mode for some time, abandoning.
creator: tlmiller
